allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add boolean expression support for file filtering (AND/OR/NOT)

Introduces a recursive-descent parser for combining filter inputs with
boolean logic. Users can now write queries like:

  obsidian-cli list tag:project AND tag:person
  obsidian-cli list tag:project AND NOT Office:AOGR

Key changes:
- New query.go with expression parser and InputExpression tree
- Refactored list.go to evaluate expressions per-note with lazy-loaded
  noteContext caching content/frontmatter/inline properties
- Updated all CLI commands and MCP tools to use ParseInputsWithExpression
- Removed Cursor .mdc rules loading from MCP server (unused)
- Documentation updates for README and MCP tool descriptions

Backward compatible: inputs without operators are implicitly ORed.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
